heading: top-dollar bottom
subheading: angelica bridges, the baywatch babe who's rod stewart's latest girlfriend, has insured her bottom for us$4.9 million, the top-selling british tabloid sun reports. the 25-year-old bridges said she took out the insurance policy in case of a mishap that could ruin her career as an actress and model. presumably, it has nothing to do with her budding relationship with a gravel-voiced rocker 30 years her senior.
author: wired staff
text: angelica bridges, the baywatch babe who's rod stewart's latest girlfriend, has insured her bottom for us$4.9 million, the top-selling british tabloid sun reports. the 25-year-old bridges said she took out the insurance policy in case of a mishap that could ruin her career as an actress and model. presumably, it has nothing to do with her budding relationship with a gravel-voiced rocker 30 years her senior.
